title: AIIMS Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 06 Research Scientist, Lab Technician and Other Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences Jodhpur (AIIMS Jodhpur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Research Scientist-I, Lab Technician, Multi-Tasking staff, Research Scientist, and Research Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, DMLT, 12th, MD/MS, DNB, B.Sc, 10th, and M.Sc can apply for the AIIMS Jodhpur Recrui...
